EmailTemplate.name: Close Case - Virtual Business CS - HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Customer Services.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Customer Services, your query has now been resolved and we have closed your case {!Case.CaseNumber}. If you feel there is further support required in this matter please respond to this email or call the team on 0208 080 6485
Kind regards WEX Business Support WEX Europe Limited 66 Hammersmith Road, London, W14 8UD Helpdesk: +44 (0) 208 080 6485 business.support@wexeurope.com www.wexeurope.com
